targets.expr: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="POD", container=~"$container"}) by ($view)

sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod)
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", status=~"[4-5].*"}[1m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", status!~"5.."}[1m]))/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", status!~"5.."}[1m]))

sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod)
